rules_text:
Deathtouch
When Neophyte of the Old Gods enters the battlefield, rediscover a sorcery card. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's a sorcery card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Sign by sign, power by power, our true gods give me the life I was [/i]meant[i] to live.”[/i]
